name: aerodrome-base
description: Aerodrome DEX collector for Base L2. Subscribes to Aerodrome Swap events via WebSocket and publishes tradeExecuted events to NATS.

jobs.name: stream
jobs.description: Maintain WebSocket connection to Base RPC for real-time Aerodrome swap events.

jobs.name: collectSwaps
jobs.description: Fetch recent Aerodrome swap events via eth_getLogs and persist into mod_aerodrome_base.swaps.

settings.description: USD threshold to flag large swaps
JSON array of Aerodrome pool addresses on Base (WETH/USDC volatile, USDC/USDbC stable, WETH/cbETH)
